snippet.title: Doug and Lily - Steam Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Doug and Lily on: http://store.steampowered.com/app/601180/

Doug and Lily. It's platformer with a pleasant pixel graphic, where you expect incredible adventures. The player, together with the brave warrior Doug and his lovely wife Lily, has to overcome many difficulties in the way of rescuing his son, who has been abducted by a villain whose name is unknown to anyone. 

Games reviews and download: http://download.online-games.co/
